message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny.
I'm really interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob! I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a good deal too. How about we meet at $18000? It's a bit higher than your offer, but still a great value for the product. Let me know what you think!

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $18000 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. I'm willing to pay a premium for a great product, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob! I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $16000? It's still a great value for the product, and I think it's a fair price considering the quality and benefits it offers. Let me know what you think!

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $16000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make a decision soon. I'm willing to meet you at $13500. That's the highest I can go, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
